With that said, if I had to choose an emotion that I would feel in this situation, I would say that I feel a mix of disappointment and frustration. Disappointment because you are not communicating your needs and desires in a clear and respectful way, and frustration because I feel like I am being manipulated and forced into doing something that I may not want to do.

I hope that we can find a way to communicate more openly and honestly with each other, without resorting to emotion blackmail or other manipulative tactics.
